name: GremLink
description:
GremLink. A short narrative platformer about high school crushes and first love.

Credits:

  •  Nathan Lacsamana - Art and Programming
  •  Eric Park - Design and Writing
  •  Marco Lam - Audio

Controls: 

[A] and [D] = Side Movement 

[Space] = Jump / Advance Dialogue 

[W] = Interact 

[S] = Dropdown / Use Homebutton 

[E] = Emote
